column6:
On their way back home to Ithaca, Odysseus and his men stop for supplies at a mysterious isle. Little do they know it is the home to a race of monstrous Cyclopes, one of whom captures Odysseus' party and begins to feast upon them! Summoning all of his courage and wits, Odysseus embarks on a dangerous gambit to free himself and his men as the fate of his journey home takes an ominous turn!,2008,11
Rated T+ ...$3.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | other:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:ARTUR FUJITA | inker:Roland Paris | writer:Roy Thomas | penciller:Greg Tocchini
